snippet: The execution of James Foley has drawn emotional reactions from Capitol Hill, but even those criticizing President Obama for not doing more have not specified what to do.
abstract: Execution of American journalist James Foley by militants of Islamic State in Iraq and Syria has drawn emotional reactions from lawmakers in Washington, but even those criticizing Pres Obama for not doing more are unsure what to do next; many in Congress, on both sides of the aisle, are extremely wary of engaging in any new war in the Middle East.
lead_paragraph: The execution of James Foley has drawn emotional reactions from Capitol Hill, but even those criticizing President Obama for not doing more have not specified what to do.

headline.main: Despite ISIS Horror, Congress Is Wary of U.S. Military Expansion
headline.print_headline: Despite ISIS Horror, Congress Is Wary of U.S. Military Expansion
